title.native: ジュエルペット てぃんくる☆

description:
In Jewel Land, Jewelpets, creatures who has the natural ability to use magic lived in harmony with the Witches, attending the School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to learn to use magic with their Jewel Eyes. However for Ruby, a white Japanese Hare whose magic sometimes fail, is appointed to go to the Human World to search for her partner. But when she used the card the magicians gave her, she was sent to the Human World by accident. In the Human World, A girl named Akari Sakura met her on the beach on her way to school. At first, Akari can't understand her due to her Jewel Land Language until Ruby took a special candy so she could speak and understand human language. As the day passes, Ruby knew about her problems and later apologized. A Jewel Charm appeared on Akari's hand and she realized it that she's chosen by Ruby to be her partner. After that, she decided to enter the Jewel Star Grand Prix, on the prize is that any wish that they wanted will be granted. Will she be the Next Jewel Star and her wish be granted in the end? Or I'll just end in one big disaster...

(Source: Wikipedia)

name.native: ミリア・マリーゴールド・マッケンジー

node.description:
__Height:__ 154 cm (5' 0")
__Hobbies:__ Piano

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/sawashiro-miyuki.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miyuki_Sawashiro) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B2%A2%E5%9F%8E%E3%81%BF%E3%82%86%E3%81%8D)

Began her voice-acting career in 1999 and has continued her work as a seiyuu for more than two decades. Her younger brother [Chiharu Sawashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/120159) is a fellow voice actor.

__Non-anime roles:__~!

• Twilight Sparkle in "My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic/Equestria Girls" (animated cartoon & movies)
• Makoto Makimura in "Yakuza 0/Kiwami 2" (VG)!~

__Height:__ 151 cm

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

She is a Japanese voice actress affiliated with Pro Fit seiyuu management agency.

[Profile](http://www.pro-fit.co.jp/talent_takamori.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/takamori_723) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/29114.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natsumi_Takamori) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AB%98%E6%A3%AE%E5%A5%88%E6%B4%A5%E7%BE%8E) | [VNDB](https://vndb.org/s979)

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Homura Ootomo](https://vndb.org/c9922) - _Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! S_
- [Ochiba Tachibana](https://vndb.org/c17042) - _AstralAir no Shiroki Towa_
- [Wakana Kariya](https://vndb.org/c26601) - _Sanoba Witch_
- Miruhj - _Utawarerumono: Itsuwari no Kamen/Futari no Hakuoro_
- [Korona Kusakabe](https://vndb.org/c35363) - _Miagete Goran, Yozora no Hoshi o_
- [Mako Hitachi](https://vndb.org/c44769) - _Senren * Banka_
- [Yuura Fuma](https://vndb.org/c55100) - _Neko-nin exHeart_
- [Ghost](https://vndb.org/c67681) - _9-Nine_
- Kaori - _Princess Connect Re:Dive_
- Aither - _Epic 7_
- Vertin - _Reverse: 1999_

Shimada graduated from the Department of Education at Waseda University. In 1981, when she was in her third university year, she learned that Toei Douga was recruiting new employees and took an exam to become a trainee director. The studio's policy at the time was not to employ women as directors, and although she scored top marks in the exam, she was encouraged to try writing screenplays instead. She made her debut with a script for episode 42 of Dr. Slump: Arale-chan, which was aired on 10 February 1982. After that, she established a successful career in scriptwriting. On 15 December 2017, she passed away at age 58 from an undisclosed disease.
